post:
Cloudean Infotech is a technology company that builds powerful, secure and scalable infrastructure for businesses.
Our highly experienced IT professionals specialize in working as your partner to fully understand your unique business needs. We’ll craft a secure end-to-end solution that meets your current business needs and supports your future goals to drive results.

Managed WordPress Hosting
Achieve foremost performance in an optimized environment

Decentralized execution of services to avoid single point of failure. Web Server, Mail, DNS, Backups services run individually on completely different infrastructure.

Freelancer / Agency High Traffic / Enterprise WooCommerce
We’ll handle hosting so you can focus on your clients Keep your site loading fast - resilient to traffic spikes Any peak sales periods go as smoothly as possible

White labelled services :

  • Non-Branded IP Address
  • DDoS protected AnyCast DNS [24 POPs]
  • Hosted Email solution

Support :

  • Daily, Weekly backup schedule [90 Days Retention]
  • Technical & migration assistance
  • Uptime monitoring : services & hosted domains
  • 100% Uptime SLA

Account features :

  • Nginx web server & Percona DB [MySQL]
  • PHP [7.1,7.2,7.3]
  • Redis cache engine
  • WP-CLI / SFTP access
  • Free SSL [Let’s Encrypt]
  • Update safety & Staging
  • High Availability setup*

Location : Australia, Austria, Canada, China, Germany, Indonesia, Ireland, Japan, Netherlands, Poland, Singapore, UAE, UK, USA [NY, IL, TX, CA].

Hostballs exclusive promotion! : Get €05 & €20 recurring lifetime discount!
Promotional code : HBWP05 & HBWP20
